lead: I will generate a new secure password every {refreshRate} seconds. Just click the password to keep the current one.

store.title: Do you store my password?
store.content: You decide which one to take and we will not store any of the generated passwords. That way you can be sure only you know which password you chose.

secure.title: How secure are these passwords?
secure.content: All passwords are checked against a set of rules to ensure they does not contain patterns which would make it easy for programs to guess the password.

opensource.title: Can I read the source code?

content.pre: Of course you can. It's published on
content.post: together with a test suite to ensure the passwords are safe.
